references.paper_title: Instructpix2pix: Learning to follow image editing instructions
references.reason: This paper introduces a method for controllable image editing, which is highly relevant to the goals of controllable human image generation.
This foundational paper on diffusion models underpins the core methodology of the current work.

references.paper_title: High-resolution image synthesis with latent diffusion models
references.reason: This work significantly advanced diffusion models, enabling higher-quality image generation which directly benefits the research presented.

references.paper_title: Learning transferable visual models from natural language supervision
references.reason: This paper introduced CLIP, a crucial element in many modern text-to-image models, including those underlying this work.

references.paper_title: Viton-hd: High-resolution virtual try-on via misalignment-aware normalization
references.reason: This paper provides a dataset and approach for high-resolution virtual try-on, directly relevant to the problem of generating clothing on humans.
